NETWORK_PORT.description: Number of port for the network connection

NETWORK_USERNAME.description: Input text area for the name of the user on the raspberry pi

NETWORK_PASSWORD.description: Input text area for the password of the user on the raspberry pi

NETWORK_SHOWPASSWORD.description: Switch use to make the password visible

DEVICE_CONNECT.description: Button used to connect to a device

DEVICE_SERIAL_OPTIONS.description: The title of the serial device options dialog

DEVICE_BAUDRATE.description: The baud rate input of the serial port options dialog

NETWORK_CONNECTION.description: Title of the popup used to connect to a device

DEVICE_WYAPP_SSH_IP_ADDRESS.description: The name of the pseudo device that allows the user the connect to any IP address

DEVICE_WYAPP_CHANGE_CREDENTIALS.message: Vous avez essayé de vous connecter en utilisant les informations d'identification par défaut pour ce périphérique. Nous vous recommandons de changer le mot de passe en utilisant la commande passwd dans le Shell.
DEVICE_WYAPP_CHANGE_CREDENTIALS.description: Warning message when the user tries to login to a board with the default credentials.
